nodes.text: "Dangerous Dreams" was a song by the band Red Shift Limit from their eponymous compilation album. The album was available in the galaxy by the time period between the years 0 ABY and 4 ABY. The song was banned by the Imperial Board of Culture due to Red Shift Limit's anti-Imperial stance.

The song "Dangerous Dreams" was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann and published in 1993.
